# load libs
```{r}

library(data.table)
library(caret)
library(mvnfast)
library(geoR)
library(MCMCpack)
library(brms)

```

# load data
```{r}

mbta_train <- 0
mbta_test  <- 0



```

# use brms
```{r}

# normally distributed weights
prior <- default_prior(
  delay_m ~ weather + temperature,
  data = mbta_train,
  family = gaussian()
)

# define posterior
mbta_brm <- brm(
  delay_m ~ weather + temperature,
  data = mbta_train,
  family = exponential(),
  prior = prior,
  chains = 4,
  iter = 10000,
  warmup = 1800,
  cores = 4,
  file = "mbta_model.rds"
)
```

# check model confidence
```{r}
# check summary and R2
summary(mbta_brm)

# plot posterior histograms / traceplots
plot(mbta_brm) 

# bayes_R2
bayes_R2(mbta_brm)
```

# perform predictions
```{r}
# get posterior predictions for test data 
post_preds_test <- posterior_predict(
  mbta_brm,
  newdata = mbta_test,
)

# print col means
predicted_delay <- colMeans(post_preds_test)
predicted_delay
```
